article.headline: Santa Clara 62, Pepperdine 54
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- Marc Trasolini scored 16 points and grabbed eight rebounds to lead Santa Clara over Pepperdine 62-54 on Saturday night. Robert Smith scored 12 points for the Broncos (11-17, 3-8 West Coast Conference), while Raymond Cowels and Niyi Harrison scored 11 points apiece off the bench. Keion Bell led Pepperdine (7-19, 3-7) with 25 points, while Michael Thompson scored 12 and Jonathan Dupre nine. The Waves lost their seventh straight game and fell to 0-10 on the road. After a 31-31 halftime tie, Santa Clara opened the second half with a 14-4 run, building a 45-36 lead with 11:49 remaining.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
